snippet.title: The Designer's Curse - Chapter 1 - Free Horror Game, Full Walkthrough
snippet.description:
DOWNLOAD CHAPTER ONE FOR FREE HERE- 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1119060/The_Designers_Curse/

This is my latest horror project! With inspirations from the works of frictional games (Amnesia, Penumbra) and I actually worked with the same composer (Mikko Tarmia,  who composed incredible monster themes and ambiences!) 

The full soundtrack will be posted to YouTube soon. The game will be released on Steam too as well.
